component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

direction.description: Defines the flex-direction style property. It is applied for all screen sizes.

divider.description: Add an element between each child.

spacing.description: Defines the space between immediate children.

sx.description: The system prop, which allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

useFlexGap.description:
If true, the CSS flexbox gap is used instead of applying margin to children.
While CSS gap removes the known limitations, it is not fully supported in some browsers. We recommend checking https://caniuse.com/?search=flex%20gap before using this flag.
To enable this flag globally, follow the theme's default props configuration.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
